title: More Leaks: We now know the new Just Products!
content:
Ok, so the new "Just" product webinar is all the way on the 27th of April

However my navigating to the JustCode forums a few minutes ago showed me this

![Just other products](/images/posts/more-leaks-we-now-know-the-new-just-products/2011_04_13_justotherproducts.png?sfvrsn=97058b66_2 "2011_04_13_JustOtherProducts")

Hmmmm...now I know JustCode can decompile; so what happened here.Â  Either they're breaking it out into a seperate product or it has it's own forum now.

But JustTrace has GOT to be the new product.

1.  JustCode doesn't Trace, and that IS a hole in the telerik suite
2.  Begins with **Just**
seoDescription: I found the new telerik products, with the help of telerik
